alert.note: Alert for Bear River Range; Big Hole Mountains; Blackfoot Mountains; Caribou Range; Marsh and Arbon Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 09 at 12:44PM MST until March 11 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 5 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected in the mountains with a mix of rain and snow in the valleys. Total snow accumulations of 12 to 24 inches in the mountains above 6000 feet MSL and 3 to 7 inches in the valleys below. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph, particularly Friday. * WHERE...Inkom, McCammon, Downey, Lava Hot Springs, Grace, Soda Springs, Henry, and Bone. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible at times. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Bear River Range; Big Hole Mountains; Blackfoot Mountains; Caribou Range; Marsh and Arbon Highlands
